page.title: 05MILTON JUNIOR SCHOOL
page.content: Each class is divided into 30 children on average.The subjects which are covered in this school include Mathematics,English,History,Geography, Scripture,Science,P.E.(Physical Exercise)and Games.We also have a wide variety of extra-curricula activities during the lunch break and after school.These include chess,football, netball,cricket,running,athletics, music,and safe cycling. We have two music teachers who come in for short periods to teach the violin and clarinet to children who are interested.Most chidren stay at school during the lunch break.School dinners are 55p each but many children have them free as they come from "low-income" families.
